text: amendment granting the right to vote to year olds and celebrating youth voting and office holding youth franchise and youth officeholder day the governor shall proclaim may as youth franchise and youth officeholder day in new hampshire in honor of the th anniversary of new hampshire s ratification on may of the th amendment to the united states constitution which granted the right to vote to year olds and made year olds eligible to hold office in the state the proclamation shall highlight and celebrate young voters and young elected officials
